title: Svix (YC W21) Is Hiring a Rust Backend Engineer (Remote)
description:
At Svix (YC W21), we're building webhooks-as-a-service. We are looking for a backend engineer with Rust experience to build performant message delivery at scale. We are also looking for an engineer who is excited by open source software.

You will have a huge impact on the trajectory of the compa…

hn_item.title: Open index of scholarly papers launches

og_item.title: Rust Backend Engineer at Svix | Y Combinator
og_item.description:
At Svix (YC W21), we're building webhooks-as-a-service. We are looking for a backend engineer with Rust experience to build performant message delivery at scale. We are also looking for an engineer who is excited by open source software.

You will have a huge impact on the trajectory of the company and the product. You will be trusted to take ownership, have autonomy, and be a leader. You will get to solve interesting problems and technical challenges. We move fast, and speed of execution is one of our core values. We are obsessed with providing a great developer experience, and you will be expected to share this obsession.

About you:
- Two or more years of software engineering experience
- Knowledge of Rust
- Experience with designing APIs, using databases, and building robust systems

Nice to haves:
- Maintaining or contributing to open-source projects
- Knowledge of Postgres, Redis
- Experience building webhooks systems, asynchronous queues, messaging systems, or other developer-oriented products
